title: How to Logout of YouTube on Android

steps.title: The YouTube icon looks like a white Play button in a red rectangle.
steps.content: The YouTube icon looks like a white Play button in a red rectangle. You can find it on your Apps menu.

steps.title: It's located in the upper-right corner of your screen.
steps.content: It's located in the upper-right corner of your screen. Tapping will open your Account menu.

steps.title: You'll find the Sign out button on the account menu.
steps.content: You'll find the Sign out button on the account menu. Tapping will sign you out of your account. You can now use the YouTube app anonymously.
